message: This offer aims for an even split considering the diminishing value of money over rounds. Please consider accepting it.
I'm going for a strong opening, Alice. Be prepared to negotiate!
I propose an equal division of the remaining funds, recognizing the importance of fairness and mutual benefit in our negotiation.
I'm taking a firmer stance, Alice. You'll need to meet me halfway if you want a better deal.
I believe in a balanced approach. This proposal aims to give you a slight advantage while still being fair. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
I'm getting aggressive, Alice. This is my best offer so far. Take it or leave it!
I'm willing to compromise further. This proposal seeks to maintain a reasonable balance while respecting the diminishing value of money. Let's see if we can move forward.
I'm making a strong push for the majority of the remaining funds. Don't expect any more concessions!
I appreciate the effort to find common ground. This proposal aims for a more equitable split, acknowledging the reduced value of money. Let's see if we can reach a satisfactory conclusion.
I'm taking a hardline stance now. This is my final offer. You'll get a tiny fraction, but it's better than nothing.
